mapper.select: SELECT AAA.* FROM( select count(*) over() as total_count, AA.* FROM( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY GD_REGDATE desc) RNUM, GD_GID, GD_GNAME, GD_PRICE, GD_DCPRICE, GD_REGDATE, GD_CATEGORY, GD_IMAGE from GOODS ) AA ) AAA WHERE AAA.RNUM BETWEEN 0 AND 8

SELECT AAA.* FROM( select count(*) over() as total_count, AA.* FROM( select ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY GD_SELL desc) RNUM, GD_GID, GD_GNAME, GD_PRICE, GD_DCPRICE, GD_REGDATE, GD_CATEGORY, GD_IMAGE from GOODS ) AA ) AAA WHERE AAA.RNUM BETWEEN 0 AND 8

SELECT GD_GID, GD_GNAME, GD_IMAGE, GD_PRICE, GD_DCPRICE, R FROM (SELECT GD_GID, GD_GNAME, GD_IMAGE, GD_PRICE, GD_DCPRICE, ROWNUM R FROM (SELECT GD_GID, GD_GNAME, GD_SELL, GD_IMAGE, GD_PRICE, GD_DCPRICE FROM GOODS ORDER BY GD_SELL DESC) ) WHERE R BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE BD_GID=#{GD_GID} AND BD_TYPE='R'
SELECT * FROM BOARD WHERE BD_GID=#{GD_GID} AND BD_TYPE='Q'

choose.when: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM,S.* FROM (SELECT GD_GID, GD_GNAME, GD_IMAGE, GD_PRICE, GD_DCPRICE FROM GOODS ORDER BY GD_DCPRICE ASC)S)
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM,S.* FROM (SELECT GD_GID, GD_GNAME, GD_IMAGE, GD_PRICE, GD_DCPRICE FROM GOODS ORDER BY GD_DCPRICE DESC)S)
choose.otherwise: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY GD_GID DESC) RNUM, GD_GID, GD_GNAME, GD_IMAGE, GD_PRICE, GD_DCPRICE FROM GOODS

mapper.select: SELECT GD_GID, GD_GNAME, GD_IMAGE, GD_REGDATE, GD_PRICE, GD_DCPRICE, GD_STOCK, GD_SELL, GD_CATEGORY, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY GD_GID DESC) RNUM FROM( SELECT GD_GID, GD_GNAME, GD_IMAGE, GD_REGDATE, GD_PRICE, GD_DCPRICE, GD_STOCK, GD_SELL, GD_CATEGORY FROM GOODS WHERE GD_CATEGORY=#{GD_CATEGORY} ORDER BY GD_GID DESC ) ORDER BY RNUM
mapper.insert:
SELECT GD_GID_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO GOODS( GD_GID, GD_GNAME, GD_PRICE, GD_DCPRICE, GD_STOCK, GD_CATEGORY ) VALUES( #{GD_GID}, #{GD_GNAME}, #{GD_PRICE}, #{GD_DCPRICE}, #{GD_STOCK}, #{GD_CATEGORY} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM GOODS ORDER BY GD_GID DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT GD_GID, GD_GNAME, GD_IMAGE, GD_PRICE, GD_DCPRICE, GD_STOCK, GD_SELL, GD_CATEGORY, ROWNUM R FROM ( SELECT GD_GID, GD_GNAME, GD_IMAGE, GD_PRICE, GD_DCPRICE, GD_STOCK, GD_SELL, GD_CATEGORY FROM GOODS ORDER BY GD_SELL DESC ) ORDER BY R ) WHERE R BETWEEN #{START} AND #{END}
SELECT * FROM GOODS WHERE GD_GNAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
